get_deleted: SELECT is_deleted, rev FROM hiring_taxiparks_gambling_salesforce.hiring_conditions WHERE sf_id='must_delete';
get_new: SELECT sf_name, rev FROM hiring_taxiparks_gambling_salesforce.hiring_conditions WHERE sf_id='must_add';
get_not_updated: SELECT sf_name, rev FROM hiring_taxiparks_gambling_salesforce.hiring_conditions WHERE sf_id='must_not_update';
get_updated: SELECT sf_name, rev FROM hiring_taxiparks_gambling_salesforce.hiring_conditions WHERE sf_id='must_update';
